Introduction.fan-translation: My name is Lily Rubellum. I don't stand out, and my social status is all I have going for me, but I'll still try my best! In flower language I'm Purity. I never tell lies, and try to live as straightforward as I can!

Appearance.fan-translation: N- Nice to meet you, uh... my lord? Right? I don't know how much I can help, but I'll give it my best shot.

Starting a Battle 1.mt-translation: Oh, are we going to fight?

Starting a Battle 2.machine-translation: I ... I will fight as much as I can
Starting a Battle 2.mt-translation: I... I will fight as much as I can

General (Anger).raw-japanese: あーんっ、もう怒っちゃいます！

Hit Damage.raw-japanese: あああっ、気をつけなくちゃ
Hit Damage.machine-translation: Oh, you have to be careful
Hit Damage.mt-translation: Ow! I need to be more careful.

Hit Damage (Fatal).machine-translation: Well, I will still try my best ...
Hit Damage (Fatal).mt-translation: Ah, but I tried my best...

General (Excited).raw-japanese: えへへ、はりきっちゃいます

Victory in Battle 2 (Narrow Victory).raw-japanese: なんとか勝てたみたいです…
Victory in Battle 2 (Narrow Victory).machine-translation: I think I managed to win ...
Victory in Battle 2 (Narrow Victory).mt-translation: I think we managed to defeat them...

Logging in 1.machine-translation: I also prepared the preparation. alright, let's go
Logging in 1.mt-translation: I've finished getting everything prepared.  Come on, let's go.

Victory in Battle 3 (Easy Victory).raw-japanese: うまくいきましたねっ

Unable to Defeat the Enemy 1.machine-translation: that? I wonder if I made a mistake ...
Unable to Defeat the Enemy 1.mt-translation: Did I make a mistake there...?

Unable to Defeat the Enemy 2.raw-japanese: うまくいかなかったみたいです…
Unable to Defeat the Enemy 2.machine-translation: It seems that it did not go well ...
Unable to Defeat the Enemy 2.mt-translation: That didn't go well at all...

Logging in 2.raw-japanese: 害虫って、本当にやっかいですよね

Logging In 3.raw-japanese: 私、まっすぐに戦えてますか？
Logging In 3.machine-translation: Am I able to fight straight?
Logging In 3.mt-translation: Will you need me to fight today?

Hidden Door Found.fan-translation: I think we can go into this stage.

Treasure Chest.raw-japanese: お仲間さんを発見しました
Treasure Chest.mt-translation: I think I found an ally.

Talking 1.raw-japanese: 団長さんは、グラジオラスちゃんを知ってますか？グラジオラスちゃんは、とっても強くて、私と違ってとーってもかっこいいんです。はぁ…私もあんな風になれたらなぁ
Talking 1.machine-translation: Does the headmaster know Gladiolas? Gradiolus is very strong, it is cool too, unlike me. Haa ... I wish I could be like that
Talking 1.mt-translation: Knight Commander, do you know Gladiolus? She's really cool and strong, unlike me. Ha... I wish I could be like her.

Party Member Selection 1.raw-japanese: うれしいです、よろしくお願いします
Party Member Selection 1.mt-translation: I'm happy that you chose me, thank you.

Party Member Selection 2.raw-japanese: お役に立てるように、がんばります
Party Member Selection 2.machine-translation: I will do my best to serve you.
Party Member Selection 2.mt-translation: I will do my best to serve you.

Change Equipment.machine-translation: I wonder if this will suit me ...
Change Equipment.mt-translation: I wonder if this will suit me ...

Talking 2.raw-japanese: 私、こんなに引っ込み思案で目立たないですけど、実は家柄はよくって…それがなんだかプレッシャーですよぅ… でも、団長さんのお役に立てるように、がんばってみたいです
Talking 2.machine-translation: I am not conspicuous with such a retraction, but in fact the family is good ... that is somehow under pressure ... However, I would like to do my best to serve as the headmaster
Talking 2.mt-translation: I'm not very conspicuous, even though I come from a noble family... I worry that I can't live up to my family name... Even so, I want to do my best to serve the Knight Commander

Leveling Up.raw-japanese: 前より強くなれたかな？
Leveling Up.machine-translation: Did I become stronger than before?

Play Gacha FREE 1x Daily.raw-japanese: さ、なにかいいことあるかもですよ？
Play Gacha FREE 1x Daily.mt-translation: Maybe you can get something good?

My Page General Use 1.raw-japanese: 団長さん、一緒にがんばりましょうね？
My Page General Use 1.machine-translation: Let's do our best together, will not you?
My Page General Use 1.mt-translation: Let's do our best together, okay?

Talking 3.raw-japanese: なんだか最近、グラジオラスちゃんを見たときに感じる想いと、団長さんと一緒にいるときに感じる想いが、似てきてるような気がするんです。 団長さんは私のあこがれで…そして、男の人で…えと…その…この気持ち、どうすれば収まるんでしょう？
Talking 3.machine-translation: Somehow recently, I feel that the feelings I feel when I see Gradiolus and the feelings I feel when I'm with the headmaster. My grandmaster is longing for myself ... And a man ... And ... That ... ... How do you feel about this feeling?
Talking 3.mt-translation: Recently I've been feeling the same feeling when I'm with the Knight Commander as I do when I'm watching Gladiolus. I want to keep the Knight Commander all to myself... And... Um... Well... Do you feal the same?

My Page General Use 2.raw-japanese: 今日も害虫退治に出かけましょう
My Page General Use 2.machine-translation: Let's go out for pest control today as well
My Page General Use 2.mt-translation: Let's go exterminate pests again today.

Stamina is fully recovered.raw-japanese: また害虫退治に出かけましょ？
Stamina is fully recovered.machine-translation: The stamina is full. Let's go out to pest insects again?
Stamina is fully recovered.mt-translation: Your stamina is full. Should we go out to exterminate pests again?

My Page General use 3.raw-japanese: 団長さん、私にできることがあったら言ってください
My Page General use 3.machine-translation: Headmaster, please say something I can do
My Page General use 3.mt-translation: Knight Commander, please tell me how I can help you

My Page Placement.raw-japanese: あの…ずっと会えなくてさびしいです…
My Page Placement.machine-translation: Um ... I feel lonely without meeting ...
My Page Placement.mt-translation: Um... I'll feel lonely without you around...

Giving Gifts 1.fan-translation: Thank you very very much ? I'll cherish it always!

Giving Gifts 2.fan-translation: Whoa, awesome! I love these! How did you know?!

Moving 2.raw-japanese: どんどん前に進みましょう

Login Bonus.machine-translation: It is a pest eradication today as well.
Login Bonus.mt-translation: Today will be another day of pest extermination.

Battle Skill 3 (bloomed).machine-translation: I decide ... I will show it!

Battle Skill 4 (bloomed).machine-translation: It is a game winning place!

My Page General use 4 (bloomed).raw-japanese: 少しずつですけど、団長さんの力になれている…そんな気がしています
My Page General use 4 (bloomed).machine-translation: Although it is little by little, I am used to the captain 's power ... I feel that way
My Page General use 4 (bloomed).mt-translation: Little by little, I'm starting to understand the Knight Commander's power... Or at least I think so

My Page General use 5 (bloomed).raw-japanese: 昔よりも、強くなった実感はあります。 でも、不思議ですね…強くなれば強くなるほど、自分の至らないところが見えてきます。 妙な感じです……グラジオラスちゃんも、こんな気分だったのかな…？
My Page General use 5 (bloomed).machine-translation: I feel stronger than before. But it is strange ... the stronger you become, the more you can not see yourself. It is a strange feeling ...... Maybe Gladiolus was feeling like this ...?
My Page General use 5 (bloomed).mt-translation: I feel stronger than before. But it's strange... it seems like the stronger you become, the harder it is to depend on others. It's an odd feeling...  Maybe this is how Gladiolus feels...?

My Page General use 6 (bloomed).raw-japanese: はぁ、はぁ、はぁ…あ、団長さん、お疲れ様です！ ちょっと、型稽古をしていて…ようやく、形になってきました。 ふぅ…この調子で、もっと頑張ります！
My Page General use 6 (bloomed).machine-translation: Haa, huh, huh ... Oh, my head coach, thanks for your hard work! Hey, I was doing type practice ... Finally, it came in shape. Fu ... I will do my best with this condition!
My Page General use 6 (bloomed).mt-translation: Haa, *huff* *huff* ... Oh, Knight Commander, thank you for all your hard work! I was doing some spear practice, it finally feels like it's coming together.  Fu... I'll keep working to improve!

Conversation 4.raw-japanese: いつか、グラジオラスちゃんと並び立てるような、立派な花騎士になりたい…！ そう思って頑張ってきました。 そのおかげで、足を引っ張らないくらいにはなれたかな…と思います。 背中を任せてもらえるのは、まだ、ずっと先みたいですけど。
Conversation 4.machine-translation: Someday, I would like to be a fine flower knight like lining up with Gladiolas ...! I pushed hard on thinking so. Thanks to that, I wonder if I could not pull my legs ... I think. It seems to be a long way ahead that I can leave my back. Hi! ♪
Conversation 4.mt-translation: Someday, I want to be a great flower knight standing side-by-side with Gladiolus! I've pushed myself hard to achieve that goal, though I don't know, maybe it's too difficult for me... It seems so far away, but even so I won't give up. Hiya! ♪

Conversation 5.raw-japanese: 私、花騎士になってから、誰かに背中を守ってもらってばかりです。 だから、今度は私が、グラジオラスちゃんや団長さんの背中を守りたいんです…！ そのためには、もっと強くならなくちゃ！
Conversation 5.machine-translation: Since I became a flower knight, I have just kept my back on someone. Therefore, next time I want to protect the back of Gradiolus and the headmaster ...! To do that, we have to get even stronger!
Conversation 5.mt-translation: Ever since I became a flower knight I've had to have others watching my back. Because of that, next time I want to be the one protecting Gladiolus and the Knight Commander!  To do that, I have to become even stronger!

Conversation 6.raw-japanese: 相変わらず、自分には自信はありません…。 ですけど、一つだけ、これだけは自信を持って言えます！ 私は、もっと強くなります！ 団長さんと一緒にいると、なぜだか、そう思うんです。
Conversation 6.machine-translation: As usual, I am not confident .... But, only one thing, I can say with confidence! I will be stronger! When I am with the headmaster, why do you think so.
Conversation 6.mt-translation: As usual, I am not very confident...  But there is one thing that I can say with absolute confidence!  I will become stronger!  When I'm with the Knight Commander, I know this.

Passing through pest nest.raw-japanese: ううっ、痛い！ …気をつけなくちゃ…
Passing through pest nest.machine-translation: Huh, it hurts! I have to be careful ...
Passing through pest nest.mt-translation: Ow, that hurts! I have to be more careful...

Christmas 2015 1.raw-japanese: メリークリスマス！ 全ての人々が、安らかに過ごせることを願っております。 …だけどもう一つ、私だけの願いを言ってもいいですか？ その…今日だけ、今日だけでいいんです。 私に、団長さんを独り占めさせてください。
Christmas 2015 1.machine-translation: Merry Christmas! I hope that all people can spend peacefully. ... But may I just say my wish? That ... only today, I need only today. Please let me have a headmasterhip.
Christmas 2015 1.mt-translation: Merry Christmas! I hope that everyone can spend it peacefully. ...Do you mind if I tell you what I wish for? That... just for today I can have the Knight Commander to myself.  Please stay with me, my lord.

Christmas 2015 2.raw-japanese: 今日はお部屋の飾り付けを頼まれているんです。 こればっかりは、グラジオラスちゃんに負けませんよ。 綺麗で温かなお部屋にしたいんです。 みんなや、団長さんに喜んでもらえるように、頑張りますね。
Christmas 2015 2.machine-translation: I am asked to decorate the room today. As for this, I will not lose to Gladiolus. I would like to make a clean and warm room. Everyone and I will do my best to make the headmaster glad.
Christmas 2015 2.mt-translation: I was asked to decorate your office today. I'll make it so warm and beautiful that even Gladiolus will be jealous. All of us will do our best to make the Knight Commander glad.

Tanabata 1.raw-japanese: 天の川を隔てて、離ればなれになった恋人は一年に一度だけ会うことを許される。 なんて切ないお話なのでしょう。 美しく、そして強い絆を感じます。 私は一年耐えられるかな？ 団長さんはどうですか？ 私と会えなくなったら、何日くらい我慢できるのかなって
Tanabata 1.machine-translation: A lover who is separated from the Milky Way is allowed to meet only once a year. What a disappointing story. I feel a beautiful and strong bond. I wonder if I can bear it for a year? How is the headmaster? If I can not meet with you, how long can I endure?
Tanabata 1.mt-translation: There's a story about two lovers who are separated and are only allowed to see each other once a year. It's such a sad story. I don't know if I could last a year without seeing you, my lord. What about you Knight Commander?

Tanabata 2.raw-japanese: 団長さんお願い事は決まりましたか？はい、これ！団長さんの分の短冊です。団長さんの事だから騎士団全体の事をお願いするんですよね。 いえ、それでこそ団長さんだと思います。でも、私の事も書いて貰えたらうれしいなぁって思います
Tanabata 2.machine-translation: Mr. Mr. Mae Do you have decided what you asked for? Yes, this! It is a strip of minutes by the headmaster. Because it's about the headmaster, you ask the whole knight team, do not you? No, I think that it is your headmaster. But I think I'm happy if you could write me as well

Summer 1.raw-japanese: 団長さん、だいぶぐったりしてますね。大丈夫ですか?私は平気です、バナナオーシャン育ちですからこれくらいなんともないんです。 でも、団長さんが辛そうだと、私まで具合が悪くなっちゃいそうです
Summer 1.machine-translation: The headmaster, I'm pretty busy. Is it okay? I am fine, because I am raised with a banana ocean, this is absolutely nothing. But if the headmaster seems to be tough, I'm getting sick

Summer 2.raw-japanese: 暑いからって肌を出すのは逆効果なんですよ。日差しが強い時は、露出を少なくした方が肌へのダメージを減らせます。 取り敢えず団長さんは服を着て下さい。それじゃ日焼けしちゃいます
Summer 2.machine-translation: It is counterproductive to get skin out because it is hot. When the sun is strong, less exposure can reduce damage to the skin. For yourself, please do not wear your clothes. Then it will get sunburned

Moon Viewing 1.raw-japanese: 流石に夜は冷えますね。はい、温かいお茶です。お団子と一緒に召し上がってください。 ふふっ、月を見上げる団長さんの横でお茶を入れる、そんなことが出来るなんてすごく幸せです
Moon Viewing 1.machine-translation: I feel cold at night. Yes, it is warm tea. Please eat it with dumplings. Haha, I put a cup of tea next to the headmaster looking up at the moon, I am very happy to be able to do such a thing

Moon Viewing 2.raw-japanese: 団長さん、さっきから私の顔ばかり見てどうしたんですか？今夜はお月見ですよ。そんなにじろじろ見られると照れちゃいます。 綺麗に見えるのは、月明かりと団長さんのせいですよ
Moon Viewing 2.machine-translation: Headmaster, what did you do with just looking at my face from a while ago? Tonight is a moonlight. I will be shy if I can stare so stinkily. It is because of the moonlight and the headmaster who looks beautiful

Fall 1.raw-japanese: 焼き芋をしようと思って、落ち葉を集めていたんですけど……色付いた葉っぱが綺麗で…。結局、もったいなくなっちゃいました。
Fall 1.machine-translation: I thought about trying for sweet potatoes, and I was collecting fallen leaves .... The leaves with colors are beautiful .... After all, it became a waste.

Fall 2.raw-japanese: 少し太ったかなぁ。…お腹のお肉がぷにぷにしてきたような…。…もう、団長さん！気にしてるんですから、笑っちゃダメですよ！ …秋は美味しいものが多いから、食べ過ぎちゃったのかなぁ…。
Fall 2.machine-translation: I wonder if I got a little fat. ... The stomach meat seems to be pounding .... ... Already, the headmaster! I am mindful, so do not laugh! ... There are a lot of delicious autumn, so I wonder if I ate too much ....

Halloween 1.raw-japanese: 団長さん、お菓子の用意はできましたか。今日は子供たちがたくさん遊びに来ますからね。おばけの仮装もばっちり。 もちろん団長さんがやるんですよ。うふっ、楽しみにしてますね。
Halloween 1.machine-translation: Mr. Mae, could you prepare sweets? Today we will have plenty of children to play. The costume of a ghost is also perfect. Of course the headmaster is doing it. I refuse, I am looking forward to it.

Halloween 2.raw-japanese: 秋はイベントが少ないから、ハロウィンがあるとちょうどいいですね。私は団長さんと一緒ならいつだって嬉しいですけどね。 でも、お菓子を貰えたらもっと嬉しい……かな。
Halloween 2.machine-translation: Since autumn has few events, it is just right that there is Halloween. I am always happy if I am with the head coach. But I'd be more happy if I got sweets ...

Winter 1.raw-japanese: 暖かい所で育ったので、寒いのはどうも苦手です。団長さん、もう少し、くっついていいですか？団長さんの身体、暖かいです。
Winter 1.machine-translation: I grew up in a warm place, so I am not good at cold. Mayor, you can be a little more sticky? The head of the grandmother is warm.

Winter 2.raw-japanese: 団長さん！風邪ですか？なんだか、声が少し変ですよ？体温が下がるとそれだけで体調を崩しちゃいますから、暖かくしていてくださいね。
Winter 2.machine-translation: Grandmaster! Is it a cold? Somehow, the voice is a little strange? As body temperature falls, it will just get out of shape so please stay warm.

Christmas 2016 1.raw-japanese: メリ～クリスマス！今年もクリスマスがやってきましたね♪去年よりも、少しは目立てるようにお洒落したんですけど… どうですか？気に入っていただけましたか？私、もっともっと団長さんの特別になりたいです…色々と、教えてくださいっ！
Christmas 2016 1.machine-translation: Merry ~ Christmas! Christmas came this year as well ♪ I felt more like I could stand a little bit than last year ... how is it? Did you like it? I, I want to become more special than the headmaster's ... Please tell me!

Christmas 2016 2.raw-japanese: メリークリスマス！団長さん♪ケーキを焼いてきました。どうぞ、召し上がってくださいっ♪ …そんなに慌てなくても、ケーキは避けたりしませんよ？でも、喜んでもらえてよかった…団長さん…大好きですよ。
Christmas 2016 2.machine-translation: Merry Christmas! The headmaster ♪ I've baked a cake. Please, please eat ♪ ... Even if I do not panic so much, I will not avoid cakes? However, I'm glad that I was pleased ... Grandmaster ... I love you.

New Year 1.raw-japanese: あけましておめでとうございます。団長さん、今年もよろしくお願いしますね。 新年の抱負、ですか？　そうですねぇ…もう少し、目立てるように頑張る、かな？ もちろん、団長さんのお役にも立てるよう精いっぱい務めさせていただきますよ！
New Year 1.machine-translation: happy New Year. Mayor, I look forward to working with you again this year. What is your New Year's resolution? That's right ... I guess I'll do my best to make it a bit more visible, is not it? Of course, I will do everything as precious as possible for the role of the headmaster!

New Year 2.raw-japanese: 団長さん、一緒に…初詣に行きませんか？　おみくじを引いて、甘酒を飲んで、お祈りするんです！ 今年も安全に、みんなが笑顔で過ごせたらいいな。 それからっ…もうちょっとだけ、団長さんにいい所見せられるように、なんて。
New Year 2.machine-translation: Mr. Mae, together ... Why do not we go to Hatsumode? I draw an Omikuji, I drink a liquor and pray! I hope everyone can smile safely this year. Then ... just a little more, so that a good place can be shown to the headmaster.

Valentine 1.raw-japanese: 団長さん！あの、これ！チョコです。…一応、手作りなんですよ。口に合うかはわかりませんけど、食べて欲しいなって。 …グラジオラスちゃんにあげたのとは、また別物なんですからね
Valentine 1.machine-translation: Grandmaster! Um, this! It is chocolate. ... It is handmade for me. I do not know if it fits the mouth, but I want you to eat it. ... It is another thing to say to Gladiolus.

Valentine 2.raw-japanese: 団長さんと出会う前のバレンタインは、グラジオラスちゃんにチョコをあげる日でした。 もちろん今年もあげますし、それでも十分素敵な日でしたけど…。 団長さんにもあげるんだって考えたら、より、楽しみな日になりました！
Valentine 2.machine-translation: Valentine before meeting the headmaster was a day to give Chlagoras a chocolate. Of course I will give it this year as well, but it was still a nice day. When I thought that I would give it to the headmaster, it turned out to be a fun day!

White Day 1.raw-japanese: 団長さん、どうしたんですか？こんな所に呼び出して？あっ！？それ……もしかして、バレンタインのお返しですか！？ わぁ、嬉しい、嬉しいです！ほ、本当に嬉しすぎて、上手く言葉が出てこないな……。 団長さん、大好きです！
White Day 1.machine-translation: Headquarters, what happened? Call up to a place like this? Ah! What? Is it ... ... Maybe, is the return of Valentine? What? Wow, I'm happy, I'm happy! Well, I'm really happy too, words have not come up well ... .... Mr. Mae, I love you!

White Day 2.raw-japanese: あのー……団長さん、頂いたクッキーのことなんですけど……もしかしてあれ、団長さんの手作りですか？ わぁ、やっぱり！どれも個性的な形をしていたので、もしかしたらと思って！ もちろん、全部美味しく頂きました！
White Day 2.machine-translation: Umm ... ... It is about the cookie you got, but ... Is that possibly handmade by the headmaster? Wow, as expected! Because none had a distinctive shape, I thought that was probably! Of course, I received all the delicious!

Spring 1.raw-japanese: ふゎぁ～、ポカポカして気持ちいい…こんな日はお弁当でも持って何処かに出かけたいですね。 そうだ団長さん！一緒にピクニックに行きませんか？たまにはのんびりお花を眺めるのもいいですよ？
Spring 1.machine-translation: Fuyo: It feels good ... It is a pleasure for me ... I want to go somewhere with a boxed lunch on such a day. That's it, Grandmaster! Why do not we go on a picnic together? Sometimes you can relax and watch flowers?

Spring 2.raw-japanese: へっくしゅん！はぁ…春風と桜の花びらが私の鼻をくすぐって、イ、イタズラしてきます…。 団長さんは大丈夫ですか？くしゃみ出ちゃうと執務に集中できないと思いますし…あの、そういう時は私にも手伝わせて下さいね？
Spring 2.machine-translation: Hello! Huh ... Spring breeze and cherry blossom petals tickle my nose, I, I'm sorry. Is the headmaster OK? I think that you can not concentrate on the office as you get sneezing ... Uh, at that time, please let me help you?

Tanabata 3.raw-japanese: 団長さんが健康でありますように。それとグラジオラスちゃんに、両親に、騎士団のみんなに…… うーん…一つずつ書いていくと短冊が足りません。ここはまるっとまとめて、みんな健康でありますように。これでいきます。 クスッ　ちょっと大雑把な願い事ですけど、いいですよね？
Tanabata 3.machine-translation: I hope the headmaster is healthy. And to Gladiolus, to parents, to everyone in the knights ... ... Well ... when I write one by one, I do not have enough strips. Let's summarize here, everyone should be healthy. This will continue. Kusu It is a coarse wish, but is it nice?

Summer 3.raw-japanese: 暑い季節こそ、暑い物が美味しいんですよ。というわけで、今日のお昼は、私も大好きな……はい、エビのドリアです！ 火傷しないようにしてくださいね。
Summer 3.machine-translation: The hot weather is delicious in hot weather. So, today's lunch is my favorite too .... Yes, it is shrimp doria! Please do not burn yourself.

Moon Viewing 3.raw-japanese: ああっ！お月様が雲に隠れちゃいました……意地悪な雲ですね。 ちょっと待ちましょう、団長さん。またすぐ風に乗って雲はどっかに行っちゃいますよ。 それに……月はどこにも逃げませんから。
Moon Viewing 3.machine-translation: Ahh! The moon hid in the clouds ... ... It is a mean cloud. Let's wait a minute, the headmaster. We will soon get on the wind and clouds will go somewhere. Also ... the moon will not escape anywhere.

Fall 3.raw-japanese: いち、に、さん、し……っと！　はぁ～～！ スポーツの秋という事で、筋力トレーニングをしています。ちなみに……食欲の秋対策も兼ねています。 ……よぉーし！　いち、に、さん、し……！
Fall 3.machine-translation: One more time, san, then ... ....! Huh ~ ~! I am doing muscle training because of the fall of sports. By the way ... It also combines the autumn measures of appetite. ...... Yo yo! one two three four……!

Halloween 3.raw-japanese: 団長さん！　トリックオらるぅ、り、とぉ！　…あ、うぅ～…決めゼリフで噛んじゃいましたぁ…やっぱり、私はダメダメですぅ…　…団長さん、もう1回、最初からやらせてください…！　…次を初めてだと思って、驚いてもらえるとうれしいです…
Halloween 3.machine-translation: Grandmaster! Trick ought to be! ... Oh, yeah ... I was chewing up with the decisive decision ... As expected after all, I'm a bad guy ... ... Please do it once more from the beginning ...! ... I think it's the first time for me to be surprised ...

Winter 3.raw-japanese: 寒いのは苦手なんですけど、雪が降るとワクワクしてきますね。なんだか、外に出て駆け回りたくなっちゃいます♪
Winter 3.machine-translation: I am not good at cold, but as the snow falls, I'm getting excited. Somehow, I want to go out and want to run around ♪ ♪

Christmas 3.raw-japanese: 団長さん…私…この1年間、いい子に出来ていたでしょうか？　いい子に出来ていたなら、今夜は安心して眠れます。　…団長さんから見て、今年の私はいい子でしたか…？
Christmas 3.machine-translation: Mr. Master ... I ... ... Were you made a good boy for the past year? If I was a good boy, I can sleep peacefully tonight. ... Did I look like a good boy this year, from the perspective of the head coach?
